Class ProgressBarPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Panel
              com.hush.awt.ProgressBarPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class ProgressBarPanel
extends java.awt.Panel

A panel for displaying the progress of the user's entropy generation.

See Also:
Serialized Form
